## maskEmails() function

Masks emails within a given string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function maskEmails(s: string, partial?: boolean): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  s | string |  |
|  partial | boolean | When true, some of the email remains |
